name: Buissons
description:
Take control of a bush and challenge your friends in a hide and seak game up to 4 players. Move when the nigh is dark and use the day as an opportunity to observe and flush out your opponents. Use the secrets of nature to your advantage and prepare for surprises: each game comes with a new forest of its own. And do not forget to drop a fart from time to time, after all it's a lethal weapon.FonctionnalitésA hide and seak game mixing action, observation and A LOT of humor
A very quick day and night cycle that punctuates each game
Each game comes with a new randomly generated forest!
More surprises coming soon!
